summary: A frontend to the Unix dict protocol command-line client.
name: netdict
description:
Netdict is a plugin to lookup definitions via the Internet with a dict command-line client. It has the following features:

    - specifying an alternate database and search strategy
    - term matching
    - syntax highlighting
    - customizable settings
    - GUI when available
install_details: Extract the archive and then `make install'. Then run ":helptags ~/.vim/doc" then ":h netdict" for more info.

versions.release_notes: Added a GUI input dialog. Read ChangeLog for more.
